title: A 25-year-old with Elon Musk ties has direct access to the federal payment system
summary: A 25-year-old engineer, Marko Elez, with prior ties to Elon Musk’s SpaceX and X, has been given administrator-level access to Treasury Department $5 trillion payments systems
